GeneDef.label: fogger
GeneDef.description: A distributed cloud of mechanites is interwoven with the DNA of the carrier. These mechanites have the ability of influencing the humidity levels of the surrounding atmosphere, causing a deep, thick fog to coalesce around.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Causes a foggy weather to be always present around this person

GeneDef.label: rainmaker
GeneDef.description: A distributed cloud of mechanites is interwoven with the DNA of the carrier. These mechanites have the ability of drastically lowering the atmospheric pressure around, causing constant precipitation.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Causes rainy weather to be always present around this person

GeneDef.label: foggy rainmaker
GeneDef.description: A distributed cloud of mechanites is interwoven with the DNA of the carrier. These mechanites have the ability of drastically lowering the atmospheric pressure around, causing constant precipitation and a deep, thick fog to coalesce.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Causes foggy rain weather to be always present around this person

GeneDef.label: rainy thunderstorm maker
GeneDef.description: A distributed cloud of mechanites is interwoven with the DNA of the carrier. These mechanites have the ability of drastically increasing electrostatic energy and lowering atmospheric pressure, causing a violent rainy thunderstorm to form.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Causes rainy thunderstorm weather to be always present around this person

GeneDef.label: dry thunderstorm maker
GeneDef.description: A distributed cloud of mechanites is interwoven with the DNA of the carrier. These mechanites have the ability of drastically increasing electrostatic energy in the atmosphere, causing a violent dry thunderstorm to form. This does not make the carrier immune to lightning strikes!

customEffectDescriptions.li: Causes dry thunderstorm weather to be always present around this person
In classic RimWorld shenanigans, fires will eventually trigger rain, which will eventually turn again into a dry thunderstorm, in a neverending circle of fuckery. Ahhh, nature!

GeneDef.label: snow maker
GeneDef.description: A distributed cloud of mechanites is interwoven with the DNA of the carrier. These mechanites have the ability of drastically lowering temperature in the upper atmosphere, causing snow to fall.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Causes snowy weather to be always present around this person
